meanings.sent1: The team felt triumphant after winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: She had a triumphant smile on her face after completing the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked triumphant after catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun set in a triumphant blaze of colors over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The triumphant music filled the stadium as the crowd cheered.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing jubilation or pride in a victory or success.
meanings.sent1: The students were triumphant when they aced the exam.
meanings.sent2: He gave a triumphant shout when he scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The dog had a triumphant wag of its tail after finding the hidden bone.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed in a triumphant display of colors in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Her triumphant laughter echoed through the halls after her promotion.
